metadata.title: CVE-2022-44034 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - negligible
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in the Linux kernel through 6.0.6.drivers/char/pcmcia/scr24x_cs.c has a race condition and resultantuse-after-free if a physically proximate attacker removes a PCMCIA devicewhile calling open(), aka a race condition between scr24x_open() andscr24x_remove().
